relatedBlades.title: Privileged access to infrastructure with Cloudflare
relatedBlades.subtitle: Extend Zero Trust controls to sensitive infrastructure resources
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare simplifies access, authentication, authorization, and auditing for infrastructure targets — without disrupting developer workflows.

columnContent.title: Reduce risks
columnContent.description: Prevent secure shell (SSH) key leaks and eliminate over-privilege risks that can leave infrastructure exposed.

columnContent.title: Streamline operations
columnContent.description: Avoid the complexity of legacy privileged access management (PAM) or DIY solutions, with a simple, granular policy editor and audit logging built in.

columnContent.title: Support developer workflows
columnContent.description: Implement Zero Trust controls that don't disrupt developer, DevOps, or site reliability engineering (SRE) teams' native workflows.

columnContent.title: Consolidate tools
columnContent.description: Achieve secure developer access to infrastructure and broader VPN replacement through the same [Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA)](https://www.cloudflare.com/zero-trust/products/access/) service.

relatedBlades.title: Converging privileged infrastructure access with ZTNA
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare is natively rebuilding acquired technology1 from BastionZero into the existing ZTNA service to simplify operations for secure infrastructure access.

- Create Zero Trust access policies for target machines and specify ports, protocols, and user connection context (e.g., *root* or *ec2-user*). - Stay out of developers' way by fitting into their existing workflows — no special CLIs or commands. Authenticate using single sign-on (SSO), multi-factor authentication (MFA), and device context. - Support compliance auditing requirements by providing clear visibility and logging every end-user command. - Consolidate legacy PAM or home-built server access capabilities into your broader [VPN replacement](https://www.cloudflare.com/zero-trust/solutions/vpn-replacement/) plan.

contentfulAsset.description: How Cloudflare provides privileged access to sensitive infrastructure

relatedBlades.title: Ready to streamline infrastructure access management?
Cloudflare's connectivity cloud strengthens security while simplifying operations
relatedBlades.description: Cloudflare's unified platform of [cloud-native security](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/cloud/cloud-native-security/) and connectivity services is the ideal foundation for application, Internet, and infrastructure access:

columnContent.title: Composable architecture
columnContent.description: Address a full range of security and networking requirements by capitalizing on extensive interoperability and customizable services.

columnContent.title: Performance
columnContent.description: Provide superior remote user experiences with a global network that is approximately %{OperationMilliseconds} ms from ~%{GlobalInternetConnectedPercent}% of Internet users.

columnContent.title: Reliability
columnContent.description: Offer highly available access through the resilient Cloudflare Anycast network architecture, with a 100% uptime SLA for paid plans.

columnContent.title: One platform, one network
columnContent.description: Consolidate security service edge (SSE) / Zero Trust capabilities on Cloudflare's unified platform and control plane for better total cost of ownership.

features.title: Privileged access to cloud and on-prem infrastructure
features.description: Get an overview of Cloudflare's solution for privileged infrastructure access and the value of consolidating tools alongside VPN replacement.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: 1 Diagram reflects acquired technology from BastionZero getting natively rebuilt into Cloudflare's ZTNA service. For a list of currently supported capabilities already delivered, see the Access for Infrastructure technical documentation.
